movie.title: Bolero
movie.description_intro: Follows the tale of a young woman's sexual awakening and subsequent journey around the world in pursuit of her ideal lover. Encounters include an Arabian sheik and a Spanish bullfighter. Her friend and butler accompany her and help to arrange her couplings. Moderate nudity and soft-porn.
movie.description_full: Follows the tale of a young woman's sexual awakening and subsequent journey around the world in pursuit of her ideal lover. Encounters include an Arabian sheik and a Spanish bullfighter. Her friend and butler accompany her and help to arrange her couplings. Moderate nudity and soft-porn.

movies.title: Chairman of the Board
movies.summary: Surfer and inventor Edison (Scott "Carrot Top" Thompson) is chosen by his roommates to raise rent with his outrageous (and absurd) inventions. There's no luck in job interviews until he meets billionaire Armand McMillan (Jack Warden), who likes him, and leaves his company after his death to Edison. Edison has a lot of success with his inventions while the company's competitors do all they can to destroy him.

movies.title: Blutjunge Verführerinnen 2
movies.summary: After the hot action in The Young Seducers (1971), Manfred, a young playwright, dictates titillating short stories for a movie to his new assistant: a statuesque blonde and expert stenographer. More and more, with every scenario Manfred reads out, the situation is getting steamier and steamier, as fresh, humorous, and provocative vignettes succeed one another. This anthology film recounts the sexy adventures of a beautiful female skier; the frustration of a hot brunette who still has a lot to learn about bowling; the complications of desire between a shy man and his uninhibited next-door-neighbour; the chance encounter of a truck driver and a voluptuous, raven-haired hitchhiker, and many, many other sexy stories. Suddenly, things are getting a little too "touchy-feely". Will Manfred manage to keep his hands to himself?

movies.title: Empire of the Sharks
movies.summary: On a future earth where 98% of the surface is underwater, a Warlord who controls an army of sharks meets his match when he captures the daughter of a mysterious shark caller who must learn to marshal a supernatural ability if she is to free her people from the Warlord's dominion.

movies.title: Valley Girl
movies.summary: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.
